sentences.sContent: The bird is dull brown and gray in colour.
sentences.sCn: 这只鸟是暗淡的棕灰色。

sentences.sContent: Her eyes were dull with dark shadows beneath them.
sentences.sCn: 她的眼睛暗淡无光，挂着黑眼圈。

synos.tran: 钝的；迟钝的；无趣的；呆滞的；阴暗的

remMethod.val: 和充实的(full)相反的是乏味的(dull)

words.tran: 迟钝地；沉闷地；没精打采地

trans.tranCn: 不鲜明的；迟钝的；乏味的

trans.tranOther: to make something become less sharp or clear
